qas.question: Where is the Mexican Film Library located?
What large movie festival is hosted at the Mexican Film Library?
What are the two large movie companies in Mexico?
What type of theaters does Mexico City have the most of compared to other cities?

context: The Cineteca Nacional (the Mexican Film Library), <a0_0>near the Coyoacán suburb<a0_0/>, shows a variety of films, and stages many film festivals, including the annual <a1_0>International Showcase<a1_0/>, and many smaller ones ranging from Scandinavian and Uruguayan cinema, to Jewish and LGBT-themed films. <a2_0>Cinépolis and Cinemex<a2_0/>, the two biggest film business chains, also have several film festivals throughout the year, with both national and international movies. Mexico City tops the world in number of <a3_0>IMAX<a3_0/> theatres,[citation needed] providing residents and visitors access to films ranging from documentaries to popular blockbusters on these especially large, dramatic screens.
